mapper.select:
select p.id, p.org_id, d.org_name, p.post_name, p.status, p.create_date from sys_post as p left join sys_dept as d on d.id=p.org_id and d.is_delete=0 where p.is_delete=0
and p.status=#{status}
and p.post_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
order by p.create_date desc

select p.id, p.org_id, d.org_name, p.post_name, p.status, p.create_date from sys_post as p left join sys_dept as d on d.id=p.org_id and d.is_delete=0 where p.is_delete=0 and p.status=0 order by p.create_date desc
mapper.update:
update sys_post set
org_id=#{orgId},
post_name=#{postName},
status=#{status},
update_by=#{userId}, update_date=now() where id=#{id} and is_delete=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_post (id, org_id, post_name, status, create_by) value (#{id}, #{orgId}, #{postName}, #{status}, #{userId})

insert into t_post_change_warning(id, user_id, info, ring_time) value (replace(uuid(),"-",""), #{userId}, CONCAT((select real_name from sys_user_ext where user_id=#{userId} and status=0 and is_delete=0),"从", (select post_name from sys_post where id=#{postId} and status=0 and is_delete=0),"岗位变更,需要更新其危害因素关联信息"), now())
mapper.select: select id, user_id, status, info, ring_time from t_post_change_warning where is_delete=0 order by create_date desc
mapper.update: update t_post_change_warning set status=1 where id=#{id} and is_delete=0
